name: $preparation
desc: The dispensed product is ready for pickup.

name: $in-progress
desc: The dispensed product was not and will never be picked up by the patient.

name: $cancelled
desc: The dispense process is paused while waiting for an external event to reactivate the dispense.  For example, new stock has arrived or the prescriber has called.

name: $on-hold
desc: The dispensed product has been picked up.

name: $completed
desc: The dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: Actions implied by the dispense have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

name: $stopped
desc: The dispense was declined and not performed.

name: $declined
desc: The authoring system does not know which of the status values applies for this medication dispense.  Note: this concept is not to be used for other - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just now known which one.
